entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump I can see the White House now.  Trump to Jared, Boy I screwed up the Coronavirus  and the testing bigly, do u think they’ll notice all the bodies?  Jared to Trump, Don’t worry, fall back on the Wall and immigration, like Bread and Circus, that gets the base
